Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
March 2021 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

February was a great month for Justia. Two months down, ten to go! We are very excited to kick off March with a vast number of projects throughout the company and the upcoming spring season. In this issue, we are highlighting all the good stuff that went down in February. Keep up the good work, and stay tuned. There is a lot more to come!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

New Justia Lawyer Directory Profile Dashboard and Improved Profile Editor: We have released an enhanced profile editor that will make it easier for lawyers to keep their profiles up to date. The editing interface is now integrated into the profile page and is no longer a separate set of pages. Additionally, the profile page and the editing pages have a new look and feel on both mobile and desktop versions. For detailed information regarding the redesign, read this post on Onward.

Social Media Clean-Up: We audited and performed a clean-up of each of our corporate social media accounts and applied the following changes: aligned the profile and cover photos to our brand and filled out the company's information in each of the profiles. We also set up a content strategy. This is part of an ongoing effort conducted by our team.

Ask a Lawyer Updated Email Notifications: Our team updated the email alerts sent out to lawyers. It is now easier to sign up for email notifications without leaving the interface with the list of questions and answers.

Dockets Bankruptcy Cases: We continue adding more bankruptcy-focused court cases. As you all already know, we are excluding bankruptcy cases if they are about individuals.

Upgraded EchoSign Integration: Although you may not be familiar with this, it is worth mentioning that we upgraded the underlying integration with EchoSign. This feature allows our sales team to manage client contracts online. The integration will make things easy for them.

New Consumer Content: As usual, we added new consumer content to our portal new pages: Bankruptcy Forms, Domestic Violence Restraining Orders Forms, Eviction Forms, and Small Claims Forms.

Updated Existing COVID-19 Pages: We updated the Travel Restrictions, Court Operations During COVID-19, COVID-19 Reopening Plans, and Eviction, Mortgage, & Foreclosure Relief During COVID-19 pages.

Updated Amplify Reports: This month, we added a couple of new features to our Amplify reports: a new page to promote our services and diverse information from the clients’ Google My Business locations.

NEW TEAM MEMBERS

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Lucia Sanchez

Intern Engineering Team

My name is Ana Lucía, I'm 21 years old, and I'm from Saltillo, Coahuila. I'm studying Computer Systems Engineering, with a specialty in the Internet of Things at Instituto Tecnológico de Saltillo. I am a creative person and a technology enthusiast. I love to find out how things work and how to improve them. I enjoy listening to music, dancing, watching movies, and making crafts. I'm so excited to be part of the Justia team, and I expect to learn a lot. I am looking forward to upcoming challenges!

Rafael Peralta

Engineering Team

Hi! I'm Rafael. I'm 24 years old, and I'm from Ensenada, Baja California. I'm a Master in Computer Sciences from CICESE. I love learning about new technologies and development. Even though I'm young and inexperienced, I have a strong desire to discern how the world works. I like to think that something big is out there; that's why I wanted to join Justia. I play ping pong and volleyball in my free time. If possible, I often join local tournaments just for fun. I like to play video games such as League of Legends, Smash, The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, to name a few.

UPCOMING HOLIDAYS

Dates to Remember
International Women's Day - March 8th

As a focal point in the movement for women's rights, International Women's Day (IWD) is celebrated on March 8th every year worldwide. The day marks a call to action for gender parity and acknowledging women's achievements throughout history and across the globe.
St. Patrick’s Day - March 17th

St Patrick's Day, on March 17th, honors one of Ireland's patron saints. Many Americans with Irish ancestry celebrate him on this day. Shamrocks and four-leaf clovers are used as St. Patrick's Day decor to commemorate the day.
Benito Juarez’ Birthday Memorial - March 21st*

Benito Juarez, national hero and president of Mexico (1861–1872), is one of Mexico's most respected leaders. He made substantial changes and reforms to create a democratic federal republic. Benito Juarez' Birthday is celebrated every year in Mexico on March 21st.

*This is a federal holiday. It is officially recognized by Justia. For more information about holidays please visit Justikia.

Virtual Cooking Class

We want to thank all of the Justia world-class chefs who joined our first live virtual cooking class. Thank you for participating and sharing your skills, and bringing us into your kitchen. The activity was very engaging, and everyone loved the different pizza styles.

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

Headspace Guide to Meditation

Available on Netflix

"Narrated by Andy Puddicombe, the co-founder of Headspace and former Tibetan Buddhist monk, “Headspace Guide to Meditation” consists of eight 20-minute animated episodes exploring the many benefits of meditation. Whether it is by reducing stress, improving sleep, increasing focus, or improving relationships, research shows mindfulness works. Next time you’re feeling overwhelmed, allow yourself 10 minutes to step away. By simply coming back to the present moment, we can enhance our focus and overall productivity. These guided meditations are a great way to increase resilience and improve communication."

- Jessica Risso

Collaborators: Miguel Berlanga, Donovan Coronado, Haydee Garcia, Alejandra Medina, Lauren Moskie, Rene Peralta, and Jose Ramos
